metadata.title: CVE-2024-12705 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
DNS-over-HTTPS implementation suffers from multiple issues under heavyquery load

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-12705` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bind9 - 1:9.20.0-2ubuntu3.1
bind9-dnsutils - 1:9.20.0-2ubuntu3.1
bind9-host - 1:9.20.0-2ubuntu3.1
bind9-libs - 1:9.20.0-2ubuntu3.1
bind9-utils - 1:9.20.0-2ubuntu3.1
bind9utils - 1:9.20.0-2ubuntu3.1
dnsutils - 1:9.20.0-2ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bind9 package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:9.20.0-2ubuntu3.1').
isc-dhcp package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
